participant_1.background:
I had to give up my job to take care of my health.
I want to be able to combine my two passions, football and technology, by creating a wearable device that can track my performance on the pitch.
i m the lead singer for an indie band.
I have a soft spot for stuffed animals, and I'd love to get one for my baby's nursery.
i am a stay at home mom.

participant_2.background:
I believe in a progressive tax system, which means that people with higher incomes pay a higher percentage of their income in taxes than people with lower incomes
i have started creating my own comics and presenting them to publishers.
i have never traveled out of the country.
My weight is healthy and I am happy with it.
i hate paying my bills.

content.text: I am good! I am a stay at home mom and I love it. What do you do for a living?
I am a comic book artist, but I am also working on creating my own comics to present to publishers.
That is awesome! I love comics. I have a soft spot for stuffed animals, and I would love to get one for my baby's nursery.
That is so cute! I have never traveled out of the country, but I would love to go to Japan one day.
I have traveled out of the country a few times, but I would love to go to Ireland.
That would be cool! I have a healthy weight and I am happy with it. What about you?
I am happy with my weight too. I had to give up my job to take care of my health, but I am now a lead singer for an indie band.
That is great! I love music, but I am not very good at singing. I hate paying my bills, but I believe in a progressive tax system.
I agree with you about the progressive tax system. I think it is important to make sure that people with higher incomes pay more in taxes than people with lower incomes.
That is exactly what I think! I am glad we agree.
